subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|肉|alt1=⺼|t1=meat, body|复|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a part of the body.

* {{ja-r|山%腹|さん%ぷく}}: [[mountainside]]

* {{ja-r|切%腹|せっ%ぷく}}: [[harakiri]]
* {{ja-r|鱈%腹|たら%ふく}}: [[to one's heart's content]]
* {{ja-r|腹%腔|ふく%くう}}: [[abdominal]] [[cavity]]
